message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500.

Bob, I appreciate your interest but $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to be closer to my asking price.  How about $8,750? This would be a good deal for both of us.
I'm still interested in the product, but $8,750 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
